title: [HOLD for payment 2024-08-05] [$250] Expensify Card - Offline indicator is below the content in "Choose a card type" page
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Launch New Expensify app
2. Go to workspace settings > Expensify Card (enable in More features)
3. Go offline
4. Tap Issue new card
4. Proceed to Step 2 - Choose a card type

Expected result: The offline indicator will be at the bottom of the screen

Actual result: None
